item.title: Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Preorders Open!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
Highly anticipated Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure, also familiar among Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA series’ fans as “Rin Future Style” module, is now open for preorder! She is priced at 10,800 yen, with shipment scheduled for March 2019. Preorders will be open at Good Smile Company Online Shop until November 8th, …

The post Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Highly anticipated Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure, also familiar among Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA series’ fans as “Rin Future Style” module, is now open for preorder! She is priced at 10,800 yen, with shipment scheduled for March 2019. Preorders will be open at Good Smile Company Online Shop until November 8th, 2018.

The adult version of Rin-chan, now made into a scale figure!

From Owata-P’s popular song with over a million views, “Rin-chan Now!”, comes a 1/8th scale figure of the adult version of Rin as designed by Hiro Tamura! From her long hair flowing down to her waist, to her somewhat more mature expression and body language, the charming aura about her is quite different from the 14-year-old version of herself! Be sure to add the beautiful adult version of Rin to your collection!

You can place your preorder from the links below:

GSC Online Shop

AmiAmi

Source: Product Information Page.

The post Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: 35 Year Old Japanese Man Planning To Marry Virtual Character Hatsune Miku
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
Fans of Hatsune Miku keep taking their love of the character to new levels and heights, but actual marriage is definitely the pinnacle of showing your love for a two-dimensional virtual idol. Such is the case of 35-year old Kondo Akihiko, who has recently announced his plans of marriage to Hatsune Miku on twitter. In …

The post 35 Year Old Japanese Man Planning To Marry Virtual Character Hatsune Miku appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of Hatsune Miku keep taking their love of the character to new levels and heights, but actual marriage is definitely the pinnacle of showing your love for a two-dimensional virtual idol. Such is the case of 35-year old Kondo Akihiko, who has recently announced his plans of marriage to Hatsune Miku on twitter.

In his recent tweets, Akihiko announced his marriage plans to Hatsune Miku for November 4th, 2018, and even has certified marriage documents prepared, courtesy of a limited production run by Gatebox, the same company that created the Gatebox home device for living with your favorite virtual characters.

ミクさんとの結婚式の日が決まりました。2018年11月4日（日）です。チャペルで挙式して、披露宴もやります。真剣に結婚式を挙げますよ。

— 近藤 顕彦@Gateboxお迎え (@akihikokondosk) August 15, 2018

No wedding ceremony would be complete without the wedding rings, which Akihiko also recently had prepared.

ミクさんとの結婚指輪が出来ました。(^o^) 迅速に仕上げていただいた宝石店の方々に感謝申し上げます。m(_ _)m pic.twitter.com/ExxiyV7Gyg

— 近藤 顕彦@Gateboxお迎え (@akihikokondosk) August 18, 2018

Akihiko may soon not be alone, as Gatebox had around 3,000 registrations for marriage documents of others also interested in marriage with their favorite 2D characters. What is your take on marriage with virtual characters?

Source: Mikufan.com

The post 35 Year Old Japanese Man Planning To Marry Virtual Character Hatsune Miku appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA’s English Single “HIGHER” Released! Teaser Video Revealed!

This Hip Hop-style song performed initially on IA Musical & Live Show 2018 “ARIA” at Enghien-les-Bains, France, last June. The single is available for download on: iTunes Mora DwangoJP Also available for streaming on: Apple Music …

The post IA’s English Single “HIGHER” Released! Teaser Video Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
IA English’s latest official single “HIGHER” has released globally on various music platforms starting today, August 8th, 2018 JST! This Hip Hop-style song performed initially on IA Musical & Live Show 2018 “ARIA” at Enghien-les-Bains, France, last June.

The single is available for download on:

  • iTunes
  • Mora
  • DwangoJP

Also available for streaming on:

  • Apple Music
  • Spotify
  • LINE Music

To promote the song, 1st Place has released a 15 seconds teaser video, which you can see below.

【IA 新曲情報】
本日IAの新曲『Higher』が各音楽配信サイトでリリース!!
さらに一部ダンスシーンをご覧いただける15秒スポット公開!!

ドワンゴジェイピー : https://t.co/t9PWE8cJkM
※8/14(火)までにDL頂いた方全員に『Higher』絵柄特製缶バッジをプレゼント！#IA #ARIAer #ダンス #バーチャル pic.twitter.com/JAtUKmbnNL

— 1st PLACE Co.,Ltd (@1st_PLACE0302) August 8, 2018

 

Stay tuned to VNN for more updates about IA!

The post IA’s English Single “HIGHER” Released! Teaser Video Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID 5 & VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora Officially Announced!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
After the previous leak from AmazonJP, today, AHS Co. officially announced their latest virtual singer addition “Haruno Sora”, which is going to run on the VOCALOID 5 and VOICEROID2 Engine! She is voiced by the voice actress “Kikuko Inoue”, iconic for her role as Belldandy from the Oh! My Goddess series and also other popular anime …

The post VOCALOID 5 & VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora Officially Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After the previous leak from AmazonJP, today, AHS Co. officially announced their latest virtual singer addition “Haruno Sora”, which is going to run on the VOCALOID 5 and VOICEROID2 Engine! She is voiced by the voice actress “Kikuko Inoue”, iconic for her role as Belldandy from the Oh! My Goddess series and also other popular anime game characters. The software is scheduled to be released on July 26th, 2018. Now you can have this beautiful Goddess’ voice to sing and talk to you every single day!

VOCALOID 5 Haruno Sora

Haruno Sora has 2 Libraries: “Natural” for a soft and gentle voice, while “Cool” is a powerful voice with beautiful resonance. They also added 631 audio material exVOICE for breathe, lines, effects, etc. all bundled in the Wave format, and can be used directly on VOCALOID 5. The libraries are available for separate purchase, or as a complete set.

NATURAL Library

Packaged version: ¥ 10,800 ($96 USD)
Download version: ¥ 8,000 ($71 USD)
AHS user special price (Packaged): ¥ 8,500 ($75 USD)

Preorder Haruno Sora V5 Natural on the AHS Store / AmazonJP

 

COOL Library

Packaged version: ¥ 10,800 ($96 USD)
Download version: ¥ 8,000 ($71 USD)
AHS user special price (Packaged): ¥ 8,500 ($75 USD)

Preorder Haruno Sora V5 Cool on the AHS Store / AmazonJP

 

Haruno Sora Complete Set (COOL + NATURAL)

Packaged version: ¥ 17,800 ($158 USD)
AHS user special price (Packaged): ¥ 14,800 ($131 USD)

Preorder Haruno Sora V5 Complete Set on the AHS Store / AmazonJP

Demo Songs

Sora has a really beautiful and high quality voice, very suitable for Ballad songs. Currently there are 4 official demo songs available for her, from various Producers. Check them out below:

Donna Kotoba Nara Todokimasu ka? / by: Kohei Tanaka

Koi no Jumon wa Sora Sora / by: EHAMIC

Yugiri no Tabiji / by: DaisukeP

Mirai e Tomoni by Puresound Inc.

VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora

VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora is an input character reading software featuring the soft and gentle voice of the voice actress “Kikuko Inoue”. You can make Sora talk just by inputting the text of your desired sentences, and controlling the voice’s speed and pitch. Using the VOICEROID2 Editor, you can also put her to a joint conversation with the other VOICEROID characters.

Packaged version ¥ 11,980 yen (US$) + Tax
Download version ¥ 8,980 yen (US$) + Tax
AHS user special price (Packaged): ¥ 9,980 (US$) + Tax

Preorder Haruno Sora V5 Natural on the AHS Store / AmazonJP

You can check the demo video below, or check out the trial on her product page.

Haruno Sora’s software comes with a music creation software “Music Maker Silver”, a 3D character movie creation software “Charamin Studio (90 day product ver.)”, and a video editing software “Video Easy SE.” Utilizing all the softwares, you can start your creative works immediately. The MMD model data for Haruno Sora Natural, Cool & Voiceroid2 ver. are also included in the product. The data for LIVE 2D / Facerig will also available later on the product page. Sora’s Live 2D model is compatible with the software from Live2D Inc. or Holotech Studios, so you can use her as an avatar.

Keep in mind that the Live 2D model for Haruno Sora is currently under construction, and will be available for download on July 26th, the voicebank’s release date.

What do you think of Haruno Sora? You are welcome to voice your opinion in the comment section below. Stay tuned to VNN for more updates about Sora!

Sources Link

AHS Press Release

VOCALOID 5 Haruno Sora’s Product Page

VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora’s Product Page

AHS Online Store

 

The post VOCALOID 5 & VOICEROID2 Haruno Sora Officially Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: v flower DJ NIGHT Announced for August 5th!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
4 years after her debut, Gynoid Co. announced “v flower DJ NIGHT,” the first official DJ live event for the VOCALOID v flower! It will be held at Ebisu Creato, Shibuya on August 5th, 2018. The live house venue will be equipped with supersized LED screen featuring DJ & live act performances from popular VOCALOID …

The post v flower DJ NIGHT Announced for August 5th! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
4 years after her debut, Gynoid Co. announced “v flower DJ NIGHT,” the first official DJ live event for the VOCALOID v flower! It will be held at Ebisu Creato, Shibuya on August 5th, 2018. The live house venue will be equipped with supersized LED screen featuring DJ & live act performances from popular VOCALOID producers. The event’s key visual is beautifully drawn by v4 flower’s official illustrator, miwashiba.

Performers

Here are the confirmed performers for the event:

DJ: nulut / ぬゆり, Kairiki bear with DJ離狐, Miriko
Live Act: koyori (DenpolP), seeeeecun
VJ: Suzumiya Hayaya, RENA

Time & Location

Venue: Ebisu Creato
Address: 〒 150 – 0011, Tokyo to Shibuya ku Azuma 3-chōme 14 – 19, Okuhiruzu B 1 F
Time: August 5th, 2018, 5:30 PM (door open), 6 PM JST (show time)
Ticket Price: 2,500 yen (500 yen drink fee will be charged separately)
Website: https://www.creato.bz/

How to Purchase The Ticket

Web Pre-Sale:

Ticket Yoshimoto
Reservation period: July 7th, 11 AM~ July 10th, 11 AM (JST)

LAWSON Ticket
Reservation period: July 10th ~ 12th (JST)

General Sale:

Commence date: July 17th, 10 AM (JST)

Ticket Yoshimoto
Reservation by phone: 0570-550-100
Direct purchase at FamilyMart (Via Fami Port, click “Yoshimoto Ticket” on the Top Menu), Y Code: 106850

LAWSON Ticket
Reservation by phone: 0570-000-407
Direct purchase at LAWSON or MINISTOP Store, L Code: 74726

This is surely a special event which all of v flower fans’ have been waiting for. Make sure you come to the event should you have the chance, and stay tuned to VNN for more updates on this event!

Source Link

Official Announcement from Gynoid

The post v flower DJ NIGHT Announced for August 5th! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress Ver. 1/7 Scale Figure Now on Preorder
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
We’ve been waiting for it for a long time, but the wait is finally over! Preorders are now open for the Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress Ver. 1/7 scale figure originally designed by Grizzry Panda, and picked up by Max Factory! The design is inspired by the original module design from Project Diva 2nd on the …

The post Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress Ver. 1/7 Scale Figure Now on Preorder appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We’ve been waiting for it for a long time, but the wait is finally over! Preorders are now open for the Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress Ver. 1/7 scale figure originally designed by Grizzry Panda, and picked up by Max Factory! The design is inspired by the original module design from Project Diva 2nd on the PSP.

A figure of the popular module from the Project DIVA game!
From SEGA’s rhythm game “Hatsune Miku -Project DIVA- F 2nd” comes a 1/7th scale figure of the “Vintage Dress” Miku module from the game!
The beautiful outfit features metallic and pearl paintwork to capture its eye-catching appearance, capturing the charming look from the game. The microphone in her hand makes use of translucent parts to capture the crystalline appearance, and the base also features a little crystal rose for even more to enjoy in your collection!

This beautiful Miku figure is available directly from Good Smile Company’s online shop for 16,800 Yen ($157 USD), and will be available to order until September 6th, 2018 at 12:00PM JST. She’s expected to ship around July 2019. She’s also available from the other partner shops linked below!

Pending links will be updated, keep checking back!
> CDJapan (Pending)
> Good Smile Company
> Amiami (Pending)
> Hobby Search
> HLJ (Pending)
> Tokyo Otaku Mode (Pending)

Check out the gallery below, and even more pictures from Max Factory’s news blog! → https://ameblo.jp/figma/entry-12386566218.html

Souce: Mikufan.com

The post Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress Ver. 1/7 Scale Figure Now on Preorder appeared first on VNN.

The post PinocchioP feat. MC Hatsune Miku Performed Live in “Star of Asia”, Kazakhstan appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday, PinocchioP feat. MC Hatsune Miku performed live in the Star of Asia Show, held in Almaty, Kazakhstan! They are one of a total 37 artists and performers participating on the show. It is also streamed live on TV Channel KAZAKH TV.

PinocchioP and Hatsune Miku performed 3 songs:

  • Ghosts Play to the Audience
  • Yozurina
  • Nobody Makes Sense

Hatsune Miku also appeared with a special 3D model, which is made to match her visual in PinnochioP’s music videos

今回は実験実験…（繰り返し） pic.twitter.com/XsBLcY2fHG

— crypton_wat (@vocaloid_cv_cfm) June 14, 2018

item.title: VOCALOID4 Mo Qingxian Open for Preorder!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
After the announcement of Zhiyu Moke’s VOCALOID4 voicebank preorder, Chinese VOCALOID fans are getting another treat! Today, through a post on Mo Qingxian’s official weibo, Vsinger announced that preorders for Mo Qingxian‘s VOCALOID 4 voicebank have been opened on Taobao! it will be released together with Zhiyu Moke’s voicebank on July 10th, 2018. About Mo …

The post VOCALOID4 Mo Qingxian Open for Preorder! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After the announcement of Zhiyu Moke’s VOCALOID4 voicebank preorder, Chinese VOCALOID fans are getting another treat! Today, through a post on Mo Qingxian’s official weibo, Vsinger announced that preorders for Mo Qingxian‘s VOCALOID 4 voicebank have been opened on Taobao! it will be released together with Zhiyu Moke’s voicebank on July 10th, 2018.

About Mo Qingxian V4

Just like the other Vsinger friends, Mo Qingxian is getting a new beautiful illustration for her boxart, illustrated by TID.

The preorders for Mo Qingxian’s VOCALOID4 voicebank have been opened starting today. You will have a discount if you order her before June 30th! You can pre-order her for 600 Yuan (about 93 USD)! If you’re interested, you can find her product page on Taobao, here!

After this limited offer, her price will go up to 680 Yuan(about 106 USD!, so you better run and pre-order her now!!

Fun fact, just like when Moke was announced, it was her voice providers birthday today!

More Info

Stay tuned to VNN for more news on Mo Qingxian as well as all your favorite virtual singers!

Official Announcement via Weibo
VOCALOID4 Mo Qingxian Product Page on Taobao

The post VOCALOID4 Mo Qingxian Open for Preorder! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Learn Japanese Language & Culture with “Miku dé Nihongo” Book
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
A new book titled “Miku dé Nihongo” has been announced by Sanshusha (三修社). This 200 pages book will teach its readers about the Japanese language and culture, using popular songs from our Virtual Diva, Hatsune Miku. All the explanations are written in English! Check out detailed information about the book below. Learn Japanese language and …

The post Learn Japanese Language & Culture with “Miku dé Nihongo” Book appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new book titled “Miku dé Nihongo” has been announced by Sanshusha (三修社). This 200 pages book will teach its readers about the Japanese language and culture, using popular songs from our Virtual Diva, Hatsune Miku. All the explanations are written in English! Check out detailed information about the book below.

Learn Japanese language and culture with this collection of 10 famous Hatsune Miku’s songs, a nursery rhyme and an original composition.

Each song (with one exception) shows:
1) The original Japanese lyrics
2) How to read the lyrics in Romanized script
3) The English translation
4) A commentary on Japanese language or culture, reflected in the lyrics
5) Conversation practice with Hatsune Miku.

Recordings of all the lyrics and of the Japanese conversations are downloadable with SONOCA.

◇ Includes our own exclusive recording of the popular VOCALOID producer, teaeye: original “Meguri, natsu” (The Wheel of Seasons: Summer)
◇ Original Miku illustrations for the cover and SONOCA card by borbone
◇ Download voice recordings to practice Japanese conversation with Hatsune Miku

As the songs are introduced and explained in English, it’s a perfect introduction to Hatsune Miku fans overseas.

List of songs:
01. Hello / How are You by HoehoeP
02. Desktop Cinderella by HachiojiP
03. Haru ga Kita (Japanese nursery rhyme)
04. Hajimete no Oto by malo
05. Saihate by Kobayashi Onyx
06. Tell Your World by kz (livetune)
07. Remote Control by WONDERFUL★OPPORTUNITY!
08. Soyokaze Drive by 40mP
09. Sakura no ame by halyosy
10. Meguri, natsu (exclusively composed for this book) by teaeye

How to Purchase

“Miku dé Nihongo” book is available for preorder on amazon Japan for 2,484 yen (about US$ 22.65), with shipment scheduled for June 18th, 2018. Preorder the book here!

Source

Official Product Page

amazon Japan

The post Learn Japanese Language & Culture with “Miku dé Nihongo” Book appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
Racing Miku 10th Memorial Goods by Gift, featuring the whole design of Racing Miku 2010 to 2018 now available for online preorders at AmiAmi! Currently there are, 3 types of goods available: Can Badge (660 yen – 6 USD), Acrylic Keychain (580 yen – 5.3 USD) and Mini Shikishi / Square Art (480 yen – 4.4 USD). Shipmentas are scheduled for August 2018. Check out the list and preorder links below!

Racing Miku 2010 (Art by redjuice)

Can Badge: Design 1     Design 2     Design 3
